paragraphs.original: 却说宝玉、宝钗听说凤姐病的危急，赶忙起来。丫头秉烛伺候。正要出院，只见王夫人那边打发人来说：“琏二奶奶不好了，还没有咽气，二爷二奶奶且慢些过去罢。琏二奶奶的病有些古怪：从三更天起，到四更时候，没有住嘴，说了好些胡话，要船要轿，只说赶到金陵归入什么册子去。众人不懂。他只是哭哭喊喊。琏二爷没有法儿，只得去糊船轿，还没拿来。琏二奶奶喘著气等著呢。太太叫我们过来说，等琏二奶奶去了再过去罢。”宝玉道：“这也奇！他到金陵做什么去？”袭人轻轻的说道：“你不是那年做梦？我还记得说有多少册子。莫不琏二奶奶是到那里去罢？”宝玉听了，点头道：“是呀，可惜我都不记得那上头的话了。这么说起来，人都有个定数的了。但不知林妹妹又到那里去了？我如今被你一说，我有些懂的了。若再做这个梦时，我必细细的瞧一瞧，便有未卜先知的分儿了。”袭人道：“你这样的人，可是不可合你说话！我偶然提了一句，你就认起真来了吗？就算你能先知了，又有什么法儿？”宝玉道：“只怕不能先知，若是能了，我也犯不著为你们瞎操心了！”

paragraphs.original: 两人正说著，宝钗走来问道：“你们说什么？”宝玉恐他盘诘，只说：“我们谈论凤姐姐。”宝钗道：“人要死了，你们还只管议论他。旧年你还说我咒人，那个签不是应了么？”宝玉又想了一想，拍手道：“是的，是的！这么说起来，你倒能先知了。我索性问问你：你知道我将来怎么样？”宝钗笑道：“这是又胡闹起来了。我是就他求的签上的话混解的，你就认了真了。你和我们二嫂子成了一样的了：你失了玉，他去求妙玉扶乩，批出来，众人不解，他背地里合我说，妙玉怎么前知，怎么参禅悟道，如今他遭此大难，如何自己都不知道？这可是算得前知吗？就是我偶然说著了二奶奶的事情，其实知道他是怎么样了？只怕我连我自己也不知道呢。这些事情，原都是虚诞的，可是信得的么？”

#### 4.1.1 简单数据类型

##### 4.1.1.1 数字

数字在任何语言中都是一个简单数据类型。在Python中，数字包括整数和浮点数。

整数就是指没有小数部分的数字。整数可以是正数、负数或零。例如，1、-5和0都是整数。

浮点数是指有小数部分的数字。在Python中，浮点数通常用小数点来表示小数部分。例如，3.14和-0.5都是浮点数。

在Python中，可以使用以下方法来创建数字：

整数：

```
x = 5
```

浮点数：

```
y = 3.14
```

也可以使用内置函数来创建数字：

整数：

```
x = int(5)
```

浮点数：

```
y = float(3.14)
```

##### 4.1.1.2 字符串

字符串是指由字符组成的序列。在Python中，字符串通常用单引号或双引号来表示

paragraphs.original: 宝玉道：“别提他了。你只说邢妹妹罢，自从我们这里连连的有事，把他这件事竟忘记了。他们家这么一件大事，怎么就草草的完了？也没请亲唤友的。”宝钗道：“你这话又是迂了。我们家的亲戚，只有偺们这里和王家最近。王家没了什么正经人了；偺们家遭了老太太的大事，所以也没请，就是琏二哥张罗了张罗。别的亲戚虽也有一两门子，你没过去，如何知道？算起来，我们这二嫂子的命和我差不多。好好的许了我二哥哥，我妈妈原想要体体面面的给二哥哥娶这房亲事的。一则为我哥哥在监里，二哥哥也不肯大办；二则为偺们家的事；三则为我二嫂子在大太太那边忒苦，又加著抄了家，大太太是一味的苛刻，他也实在难受：所以我和妈妈说了，便将将就就的娶了过去。我看二嫂子如今倒是安心乐意的孝敬我妈妈，比亲媳妇还强十倍呢；待二哥哥也是极尽妇道的；和香菱又甚好，二哥哥不在家，他两个和和气气的过日子。虽说是穷些，我妈妈近来倒安逸好些。就是想起我哥哥来，不免伤心。况且常打发人家里来要使用，多亏二哥哥在外头账头儿上讨来应付他，我听见说：城里的几处房子已经也典了，还剩了一所，如今打算著搬了去住。”宝玉道：“为什么要搬？住在这里，你来去也便宜些；若搬远了，你去就要一天了。”宝钗道：“虽说是亲戚，到底各自的稳便些。那里有个一辈子住在亲戚家的呢？”
paragraphs.english: Bao Yuyu said, "Don't talk about him. Just talk about Xing's sister. Since our house has been through a series of events, we forgot this matter. Their family had such a big thing, but it was finished so casually. They didn't invite any close friends. The Lian er brothers were in charge. There are a few other relatives, but you haven't been there, so you don't know. To be honest, our second cousin, our second cousin, is almost as bad as I am. We were originally promised to marry my second cousin. My mother originally wanted to have a decent wedding for my second cousin. But then my brother was in prison, my second cousin didn't want to spend a lot of money on the wedding. Then, my second cousin's mother was very strict. My second cousin was also very unhappy. So I told my mother to just do it. I married my second cousin. I think my second cousin is very devoted to my mother. She is better than a daughter-in-law. She is very kind to my second cousin. She is very kind to Xiangling. When my second cousin is not at home, they live a peaceful life."Though poor, my mother has been more at ease recently. It's hard to forget my brother. Besides, he always sends people to borrow things, and it's thanks to my second brother that he gets the money he needs to pay them back. I heard that he sold a few houses in the city, and he only has one left. He's planning to move there." "Why move? It's convenient for you to visit us if you live here. If you move away, it'll take you a whole day to get here," said Baoyu. "We're relatives, but we need to live comfortably. We can't live together forever," said Baochai.

paragraphs.original: 宝玉还要讲出不搬去的理，王夫人打发人来说：“琏二奶奶咽了气了，所有的人都过去了，请二爷二奶奶就过去。”宝玉听了，也掌不住跺脚要哭。宝钗虽也悲戚，恐宝玉伤心。便说：“有在这里哭的，不如到那边哭去。”于是两人一直到凤姐那里，只见好些人围著哭呢。宝钗走到跟前，见凤姐已经停床，便大放悲声。宝玉也拉著贾琏的手，大哭起来，贾琏也重新哭泣。平儿等因见无人劝解，只得含悲上来劝止了。众人都悲哀不止。
paragraphs.english: Baoyu was about to give reasons why he shouldn't move, when Wang Fei sent someone to say, "Lian Er's wife has passed away, and all the people have gone over, please go over and see her." Baoyu heard this and kicked his feet, crying. Although Baochai was also sad, she worried about Baoyu's grief, and said, "Crying here won't help, let's go over there to cry." They arrived at Feng's house, where there were many people weeping. Baochai went up to Feng's bed and let out a loud cry. Baoyu also grabbed Jiaqian's hand and cried, and Jiaqian started crying again. Ping'er and the others, seeing that no one was trying to comfort them, came up and tried to stop them. Everyone was deeply saddened.

paragraphs.original: 贾琏本与王仁不睦，见他说些混账话，知他不懂的什么，也不大理他。王仁便叫了他外甥女儿巧姐过来，说：“你娘在时，本来办事不周到：只知道一味的奉承老太太，把我们的人都不大看在眼里。外甥女儿！你也大了，看见我从来沾染过你们没有？如今你娘死了，诸事要听著舅舅的话。你母亲娘家的亲戚就是我和你二舅大爷了。你父亲的为人，我也早知道了：只有敬重别人的。那年什么尤姨娘死了，我虽不在京，听见说花了好些银子。如今你娘死了，你父亲倒是这样的将就办去，你也不知道劝劝你父亲吗？”巧姐道：“我父亲巴不得要好看，只是如今比不得从前了。现在手里没钱，所以诸事省些是有的。”王仁道：“你的东西还少么？”巧姐儿道：“旧年抄去，何尝还有呢？”王仁道：“你也这样说？我听见老太太又给了好些东西，你该拿出来。”巧姐又不好说父亲用去，只推不知道。王仁便道：“哦！我知道了，不过是你要留著做嫁妆罢咧！”
paragraphs.english:
Jialin originally did not get along with Wang Ren, so when he heard him say some silly things, he knew he didn't understand and didn't pay attention to him. Wang Ren called his niece Qiaojia over and said, "Your mother was not very careful when she was alive: she only knew how to flatter the old lady and didn't put us in her eyes. Qiaojia, you're grown up now, and you've never seen me flirt with you, have you? Now that your mother has died, all the things have to be listened to by your uncle. Your mother's relatives are me and your second uncle. Your father's behavior is also known to me: he only respects others. That year, when what was called You Erniang died, I was not in the capital, but I heard that a lot of silver was spent. Now that your mother has died, your father is so casual about it, don't you know how to advise your father?"

Qiaojia said, "My father wants to look good, but now there is no money, so many things have to be saved."

Wang Ren said, "How many things do you have?"

Qiaojia said, "What was"I heard that the old lady gave a lot of things, you should take them out." Jiao Jiao didn't want to say that her father had used them, so she had to say she didn't know. Wang Ren said, "Oh, I know, is it because you want to keep them for your dowry?"

paragraphs.original: 巧姐满心的不舒服，心想：“我父亲并不是没情。我妈妈在时，舅舅不知拿了多少东西去，如今说得这样乾净！”于是便不大瞧得起他舅舅了。岂知王仁心里想来，他妹妹不知积攒了多少。虽说抄了家，那屋里的银子还怕少吗？必是怕我来缠他们，所以也帮著这么说。这小东西儿也是不中用的！从此，王仁也嫌了巧姐儿了。
paragraphs.english: Qiaoji felt very uncomfortable. She thought, "My father is not heartless. When my mother was alive, my uncle took away so many things. Now he pretends to be so clean!" So she didn't respect her uncle anymore. But in his heart, Wang Ren thought, "My sister has accumulated so much. Even though the family was confiscated, there must be a lot of silver in that room. They must be afraid that I will bother them, so they pretend to be so clean. This little girl is useless!" From then on, Wang Ren also looked down on Qiaoji.
paragraphs.chinese: 巧姐心里很不舒服，心想：“我爸爸并没有无情。我妈妈在世的时候，舅舅不知道拿走了多少东西，现在说的这么干净！”于是她对舅舅不再看得起。谁知王仁心里想，他妹妹不知道积攒了多少。虽然抄了家，那个屋里的银子还不怕少吗？一定是怕我来缠着他们，所以也帮着这么说。这个小东西也不中用！从此，王仁也嫌弃巧姐儿了。

paragraphs.original: 贾琏心里倒著实感激他，便将平儿的东西拿了去当钱使用。诸凡事情，便与平儿商量。秋桐看著，心里就有些不甘，每每口角里头便说：“平儿没有了奶奶，他要上去了！我是老爷的人，他怎么就越过我去了呢？”平儿也看出来了，只不理他。倒是贾琏一时明白，越发把秋桐嫌了，碰著有些烦恼，便拿著秋桐出气。邢夫人知道，反说贾琏不好。贾琏忍气。不提。

When he talked to Ouping about things, Ouping was a little dissatisfied and always said that Ping'er had no master. Ping'er saw this and didn't care. Jialin sometimes came to his senses and looked down on Ouping even more. When he got angry, he would take it out on Ouping. Xingfen knew this and said that Jialin was not good. paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏心里很感激他，就把平儿的东西拿去当钱用了。他和秋桐商量事情时，秋桐就有些不服气，总说平儿没有奶奶，要代替她。平儿看出来了，也不理她。贾琏有时候明白过来，越发看不起秋桐，发火时就拿秋桐出气。邢夫人知道后，反而说贾琏不好。贾琏只好忍气吞声，不提此事。

paragraphs.original: 再说凤姐停了十馀天，送了殡。贾政守著老太太的孝，总在外书房。那时清客相公，渐渐的都辞去了，只有个程日兴还在那里，时常陪著说话儿。提起：“家运不好，一连人口死了好些，大老爷合珍大爷又在外头。家计一天难似一天，外头东庄地亩，也不知道怎么样，总不得了！”那程日兴道：“我在这里好些年，也知道府上的人那一个不是肥己的？一年一年都往他家里拿，那自然府上是一年不够一年了。又添了大老爷珍大爷那边两处的费用；外头又有些债务；前儿又破了好些财，要想衙门里缉贼追赃，那是难事。老世翁若要安顿家事，除非传那些管事的来，派一个心腹人各处去清查清查：该去的去，该留的留；有了亏空，著在经手的身上赔补，这就有了数儿了。那一座大园子，人家是不敢买的，这里头的出息也不少，又不派人管了。几年老世翁不在家，这些人就弄神弄鬼儿的，闹的一个人不敢到园里，这都是家人的弊。此时把下人查一查，好的使著，不好的便撵了：这才是道理。”贾政点头道：“先生，你有所不知！不必说下人，就是自己的侄儿，也靠不住！若要我查起来，那能一一亲见亲知？况我又在服中，不能照管这些个。我素来又兼不大理家，有的没的，我还摸不著呢。”程日兴道：“老世翁最是仁德的人；若在别人家这样的家计，就穷起来，十年五载还不怕，便向这些管家的要，也就够了。我听见世翁的家人还有做知县的呢。”贾政道：“一个人若要使起家人们的钱来，便了不得了，只好自己俭省些。但是册子上的产业，若是实有还好，生怕有名无实了。”程日兴道：“老世翁所见极是。晚生为什么说要查查呢？”贾政道：“先生必有所闻！”程日兴道：“我虽知道些那些管事的神通，晚生也不敢言语的。”贾政听了，便知话里有因，便叹道：“我家祖父以来，都是仁厚的，从没有刻薄过下人。我看如今这些人一日不似一日了！在我手里行出主子样儿来，又叫人笑话！”
paragraphs.english: 凤姐停了十几天，送了殡。贾政守着老太太的孝，总在书房里。那时清客相公，渐渐地都走了，只有程日兴还在那里，时常陪着说话。提起：“家运不好，一连死了好些人，大老爷和珍大爷又在外头。家里的钱一天比一天少，外头的庄稼也不知道怎么样，总不好过。”程日兴道：“我在这里好多年了，也知道府上的人都是自己拿钱，一年一年都往他们家里拿，府上自然是不够用了。又加上大老爷珍大爷那边的费用；外头又有些债务；前儿又破了好些钱，要想衙门里抓贼追赃，那是难事。老爷如果要整顿家事，除非传那些管事的来，派一个心腹人去查一查：该去的去，该留的留；有了亏空，就让经手的人赔补，这就有了数儿了。那一座大园子，别人是不敢买的，这里的收入也不少，又没有人管了。A few years ago, when this old man was not at home, these people began to play with ghosts, so that no one dared to enter the garden, which were all the faults of the family members. Now, investigate the servants, good ones use, bad ones, and get rid of them, this is the way to do it." Jia Zheng nodded and said, "Mr. Cheng, you don't know, the servants, even if they are relatives, can't be trusted. If I want to check, I don't know who is who. I've never been in charge of the family, so I don't know much about it." Cheng Rixing said, "Mr. Jia is the most benevolent person; if others have such a household, they will go bankrupt, and it will take ten or five years to recover, but as long as they ask these stewards, they will be enough. I heard that Mr. Jia's family has a county magistrate." Jia Zheng said, "If someone has to use the servants' money, it's serious. He can only save himself. But if the land on the register is real, it's good, but if it's just a name, it's not real."Jia Zheng listened and knew that there was a reason behind the words. He sighed: "Since our forefathers, we have always been kind and never been cruel to servants. I see that people are getting worse and worse now! If I did that, I would be laughed at! "

注意：中国白话和简单的现代普通话在语言风格和用词上有所不同。简单的现代普通话更加直白、简洁，更符合现代汉语的表达习惯。

paragraphs.original: 那甄老爷即是甄宝玉之父，名叫甄应嘉，表字友忠，也是金陵人氏，功勋之后。原与贾府有亲，素来走动的。因前年罣误革了职，动了家产。今遇主上眷念功臣，赐还世职，行取来京陛见。知道贾母新丧，特备祭礼，择日到寄灵的地方拜奠，所以先来拜望。
paragraphs.english:
Zhen Erhuo is Zhen Yu's father, whose name is Zhen Yingjia, also known as Zhen Youzhong, and he is from Jinling. He used to have a close relationship with the Jia family and often visited them. Two years ago, he was dismissed from his position for making mistakes and his property was confiscated. Now, the emperor has granted him his hereditary position and allowed him to come to the capital to pay his respects. He knew that Jia Matriarch had just passed away, so he first prepared offerings and chose a day to pay his respects at the tomb, and then visited.

paragraphs.original: 贾政有服，不能远接，在外书房门口等著。那位甄老爷一见，便悲喜交集。因在制中，不便行礼，遂拉著手叙了些阔别思念的话，然后分宾主坐下。献了茶，彼此又将别后事情的话说了。贾政问道：“老亲翁几时陛见的？”甄应嘉道：“前日。”贾政道：“主上隆恩，必有温谕。”甄应嘉道：“主上的恩典，真是比天还高，下了好些旨意。”贾政道：“什么好旨意？”甄应嘉道：“近来越寇猖獗，海疆一带，小民不安，派了安国公征剿贼寇。主上因我熟悉土疆，命我前往安抚，但是即日就要起身。昨日知老太太仙逝，谨备瓣香至灵前拜奠，稍尽微忱。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Zheng had something to attend to and could not greet his guest in person. He waited at the doorway of his study. When Zhennan saw him, he felt both sad and happy. But as he was standing in the middle of the room, he could not greet him with the usual courtesy. He instead grasped Jia Zheng's hand and told him how much he missed him. Then they sat down and had a chat. They had tea served, and they exchanged greetings about what had happened since they last met. Jia Zheng asked, "When did you arrive in Beijing?" Zhennan replied, "Yesterday." Jia Zheng said, "The emperor praised you in his decree." Zhennan said, "The emperor's praise was greater than the sky." Jia Zheng asked, "What did he praise you for?" Zhennan replied, "Recently, the bandits were very active and the people along the coast were not at ease. The emperor sent An Guo Gong to go and fight them. The emperor ordered me to go there to help with the situation, and I have to leave right away. I just heard about your mother's passing, so I came here to offer my condolences."
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政有事，不能远接，在外书房门口等候。甄老爷一见，既悲且喜，因在制中，不便行礼，遂拉着贾政的手叙了些阔别思念的话，然后分宾主坐下。献了茶，彼此又将别后事情的话说了。贾政问道：“老亲翁几时进京的？”甄应嘉道：“前日。”贾政道：“皇上恩典，必有嘉勉之语。”甄应嘉道：“皇上的恩典，真是比天还高，下了好些旨意。”贾政道：“什么好旨意？”甄应嘉道：“近来越寇猖獗，海疆一带，小民不安，派了安国公征剿贼寇。皇上因我熟悉土疆，命我前往安抚，但是即日就要起身。昨日得知老太太仙逝，谨备瓣香至灵前拜奠，稍尽微忱。”

paragraphs.original: 贾政即忙叩首拜谢，便说：“老亲翁即此一行，必是上慰圣心，下安黎庶。诚哉，莫大之功，正在此行。但弟不克亲睹奇才，只好遥聆捷报。现在镇海统制是弟舍亲，会时务望青照。”甄应嘉道：“老亲翁与统制是什么亲戚？”贾政道：“弟那年在江西粮道任时，将小女许配与统制少君，结缡已经三载。因海口案内未清，继以海寇聚奸，所以音信不通。弟深念小女，俟老亲翁安抚事竣后，拜恳便中一视。弟即修字数行，烦尊纪带去，便感激不尽了！”甄应嘉道：“儿女之情，人所不免。我正在有奉托老亲翁的事。昨蒙圣恩召取来京，因小儿年幼，家下乏人，将贱眷全带来京。我因钦限迅速，昼夜先行，贱眷在后缓行，到京尚需时日。弟奉旨出京，不敢久留。将来贱眷到京，少不得要到尊府，定叫小犬叩见。如可进教，遇有姻事可图之处，望乞留意为感。”贾政一一答应。
paragraphs.english:
Jia Zheng hurriedly knelt down and thanked him, saying, "Old uncle, you will soon start your journey, to comfort the emperor and to bring peace to the people, which is a great achievement. But the younger brother cannot see the talent in person, so I can only hear the news of the victory from a distance. Now the commander-in-chief in Zhenhai is the younger brother's cousin, I hope you can take care of him. Zhang Yingji asked, "What kind of relative is the old uncle and the commander-in-chief?" Jia Zheng said, "Last year, when the younger brother was in charge of the Jiangxi grain route, he promised his daughter to the younger son of the commander-in-chief, and they got married three years ago. Because of the case of the sea port, and then the gathering of evil in the sea, so there was no news. The younger brother deeply misses his daughter, and hopes that the old uncle can take care of it when you calm down the matter. The younger brother will write a few lines, and I will trouble you to bring it to you. I am grateful." Zhang Yingji said, "The affection of children is human nature. I have something to ask the old uncle.Jia Zheng agreed to all of it.

- “如可进教”改为“if there is an opportunity to enter a sect”
- “遇有姻事可图之处”改为“if there is an opportunity to marry”
- “望乞留意为感”改为“please pay attention to it”
- “贾政一一答应”改为“Jia Zheng agreed to all of it”
paragraphs.chinese:
贾政急忙叩首拜谢，说：“老亲翁即将启程，上慰圣心，下安黎庶，莫大之功，正在此行。但弟不能亲见奇才，只能遥聆捷报。现在镇海统制是弟的堂亲，希望您能照拂他。甄应嘉道：“老亲翁与统制是什么亲戚？”贾政道：“弟那年在江西粮道任时，将小女许配与统制少君，结婚已经三年。因海口案内未清，继以海寇聚奸，所以音信不通。弟深念小女，待老亲翁安抚事竣后，拜托您顺便一视。弟即修字数行，烦请尊纪带去，感激不尽！”甄应嘉道：“儿女之情，人所不免。我正在有奉托老亲翁的事。昨蒙圣恩召取来京，因小儿年幼，家下乏人，将贱眷全带来京。我因钦限迅速，昼夜先行，贱眷在后缓行，到京尚需时日。弟奉旨出京，不敢久留。将来贱眷到京，如果你有机会进入某个教派，遇到可以结婚的情况，请你注意一下。贾政都同意了。

- “如可进教”改为“如果你有机会进入某个教派”
- “遇有姻事可图之处”改为“遇到可以结婚的情况”

paragraphs.original: 那甄应嘉又说了几句话，就要起身，说：“明日在城外再见。”贾政见他事忙，谅难再坐，只得送出书房。贾琏、宝玉早已伺候在那里代送，因贾政未叫，不敢擅入。甄应嘉出来，两人上去请安。应嘉一见宝玉，呆了一呆，心想：“这个怎么甚像我家宝玉，只是浑身缟素。”问道：“至亲久阔，爷们都不认得了。”贾政忙指贾琏道：“这是家兄名赦之子琏二侄儿。”又指著宝玉道：“这是第二小犬，名叫宝玉。”应嘉拍手道：“奇！我在家听见说老亲翁有个衔玉生的爱子，名叫宝玉，因与小儿同名，心中甚为罕异。后来想著这个也是常有的事，不在意了。岂知今日一见，不但面貌相同，且举止一般，这更奇了！”问起年纪，“比这里的哥儿略小一岁。”
paragraphs.english:
Zhen Yingjia said a few more words, and then got up, saying, "We'll see each other again tomorrow outside the city." Jia Zheng saw that he was busy and guessed that he would not stay much longer, so he had to send him out of the study. Jia Lian and Yang Baoyu had been waiting there to bid him farewell, but Jia Zheng did not call them in, so they dared not enter擅自. When Zhen Yingjia came out, Jia Lian and Yang Baoyu went up to pay their respects. Zhen Yingjia, on seeing Yang Baoyu, was momentarily stunned and thought, "How does this look so much like my son, Yang Baoyu, except that he's wearing white clothes throughout." He asked, "How long has it been since we last saw each other?" Jia Zheng hurriedly pointed to Jia Lian and said, "This is my elder brother's son, named Jia Lian." He then pointed to Yang Baoyu and said, "This is my second puppy, named Yang Baoyu." Zhen Yingjia clapped his hands and said, "Strange! paragraphs.chinese: 甄应嘉又说了几句话，就要起身，说：“明天在城外再见。”贾政见他事情忙，料想难再坐，只得送出书房。贾琏、宝玉早就伺候在那里，准备代送，但贾政没有叫，不敢擅自进入。甄应嘉出来后，贾琏、宝玉上去请安。应嘉一见宝玉，呆了一呆，心想：“这个怎么这么像我家的宝玉，只是全身穿白色。”问道：“很久没见的至亲，你们都不认识我了。”贾政忙指着贾琏道：“这是家兄名叫贾赦的儿子，名叫贾琏。”又指着宝玉道：“这是第二只小犬，名叫宝玉。”应嘉拍手道：“奇怪！我在家听说老亲翁有个衔玉出生的爱子，名叫宝玉，因为和我儿子同名，心里觉得很奇怪。后来想这也不是什么稀奇的事，就不在意了。没想到今天一见，不仅面貌相同，而且举止也一样，这太奇怪了！”问起年纪，“比这里的哥儿小一岁。”

paragraphs.original: 贾政便又提起承荐包勇，问及令郎哥儿与小儿同名的话述了一遍。应嘉因属意宝玉，也不暇问及那包勇的好歹，只连连的称道：“真真罕异！”因又拉著宝玉的手，极致殷勤。又恐安国公起身甚速，急须预备长行，勉强分手徐行。贾琏、宝玉送出，一路又问了宝玉好些，然后才登车而去。那贾琏、宝玉回来见了贾政，便将应嘉问的话回一了遍。贾政命他二人散去。贾琏又去张罗，算明凤姐丧事的账目。
paragraphs.english: Jia Zheng asked about the recommendation of Bao Yong and mentioned the coincidence of their sons' names. Jia Jia praised Bao Yong because he valued Bao Ye, and did not inquire about Bao Yong's character. He kept saying, "How amazing!" He held Bao Ye's hand and was very gracious. He was worried that An Gong was in a hurry to leave, and they could only part reluctantly. Jia Lian and Bao Ye accompanied him all the way, asking many questions about Bao Ye. Then An Gong got on the carriage and left. Jia Lian and Bao Ye returned to inform Jia Zheng, and they repeated everything An Gong had asked. Jia Zheng dismissed them. Jia Lian then went to handle the accounts for Fong's funeral.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政提起承荐包勇，问及宝玉与他的儿子同名的事情。应嘉因为看重宝玉，没有问包勇的好坏，只连连称赞“真稀奇”。应嘉拉住宝玉的手，非常殷勤。担心安国公匆忙离开，只有勉强分手。贾琏和宝玉送行，一路问了很多关于宝玉的事情，然后应嘉才登车离开。贾琏和宝玉回来告诉贾政，应嘉问的话都回了一遍。贾政让他们散去。贾琏又去处理凤姐丧事的账目。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉回到自己房中，告诉了宝钗，说是：“常提的甄宝玉，我想一见不能，今日倒先见了他父亲了。我还听得说，宝玉也不日要到京了，要求拜望我们老爷呢。他也说和我一模一样的，我只不信。若是他后儿到了偺们这里来，你们都去瞧瞧，看他果然和我像不像。”宝钗听了道：“嗳！你说话怎么越发没前后了？什么男人同你一样都说出来了，还叫我们瞧去呢！”宝玉听了，知是失言，脸上一红，连忙的还要解说。
paragraphs.english: Bao Yuyu returned to his own room and told Baoshui, saying, "I heard about a Zheng Yuyu, but I couldn't see him, but today I met his father first. I also heard that Yuyu will come to the capital soon to visit our master. He said he looked exactly like me, but I didn't believe it. If he comes to our house tomorrow, you can all go and see if he really looks like me." Baoshui heard this and said, "Oh, your words are getting more and more senseless. You say men look like me and we have to go and see?" Bao Yuyu heard this and knew he had said the wrong thing, his face turned red and he quickly explained.
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉回到自己房间，告诉了宝钗，说是：“听说有个甄宝玉，我想要见他却不能，今天却先见了他的父亲了。我还听说，宝玉不久也要到京城，要来拜访我们的老爷。他说他和我长得一模一样，我不相信。如果他后天到了我们这里，你们都去看看，看他是不是真的和我长得一样。”宝钗听了，说：“哎！你说话怎么越来越没头没尾了？你说男人和我长得一样，还要我们去看吗！”宝玉听了，知道自己说错了话，脸上一红，连忙解释。
